pytket.device¶

class pytket.device.Device¶

The base Device class, describing gate errors, readout errors and coupling information for qubits and edges.

__init__(*args, **kwargs)¶

Overloaded function.

  1. __init__(self: pytket.device.Device, node_errors: Dict[pytket.circuit.Node, pytket.device.QubitErrorContainer], edge_errors: Dict[Tuple[pytket.circuit.Node, pytket.circuit.Node], pytket.device.QubitErrorContainer], architecture: pytket.routing.Architecture) -> None

Constructor for a Device from a connectivity graph and reported single and multi-qubit errors.

Parameters

  • node_errors – A map from node ids to error rates

  • edge_errors – A map from edges (ordered pairs of node ids) to error rates

  • architecture – An architecture containing qubit connectivity information

  1. __init__(self: pytket.device.Device, architecture: pytket.routing.Architecture) -> None

Construct a Device from a connectivity graph with no gate information.

Parameters

architecture – An architecture containing qubit connectivity information

get_average_error(*args, **kwargs)¶

Overloaded function.

  1. get_average_error(self: pytket.device.Device, node: pytket.circuit.Node) -> Optional[float]

Parameters

node – Node the gate error rates are averaged for

Returns

averaged error rates for all single qubit primitives for Node

  1. get_average_error(self: pytket.device.Device, edge: Tuple[pytket.circuit.Node, pytket.circuit.Node]) -> Optional[float]

Parameters

edge – Edge for which the gate error rates are averaged

Returns

averaged error rates for all two-qubit primitives for edge

get_error(*args, **kwargs)¶

Overloaded function.

  1. get_error(self: pytket.device.Device, gate: pytket.circuit.OpType, node: pytket.circuit.Node) -> float

Parameters

  • gate – OpType (gate) of error to be found

  • node – Node gate is run on

Returns

stored error rates for given OpType and Node

  1. get_error(self: pytket.device.Device, gate: pytket.circuit.OpType, edge: Tuple[pytket.circuit.Node, pytket.circuit.Node]) -> float

Parameters

  • gate – OpType (gate) of error to be found

  • edge – pair of Nodes gate is run on

Returns

stored error rates for given OpType and edge

get_readout_error(self: pytket.device.Device, node: pytket.circuit.Node) → Optional[float]¶

:param node readout error is found for :return: stored readout error for given Node

property architecture¶

The underlying connectivity graph of the Device

property coupling¶

Returns the coupling map of the Device as UnitIDs.

property errors_by_link¶

Returns a list of pairs of links and error rates.

property errors_by_node¶

Returns a list of pairs of nodes and error rates

property nodes¶

Returns a vector of all nodes with reported error rates.

class pytket.device.QubitErrorContainer¶

Container for gate errors for a single node or edge, contains a map between supported gate types and a float corresponding to gate error rate

__init__(*args, **kwargs)¶

Overloaded function.

  1. __init__(self: pytket.device.QubitErrorContainer, arg0: Set[pytket.circuit.OpType]) -> None

Constructs a QubitErrorContainer with a set of valid operations.

  1. __init__(self: pytket.device.QubitErrorContainer, gate_error_map: Dict[pytket.circuit.OpType, float]) -> None

The constructor for a class containing all gate errors and runtimes for a given node or edge.

Parameters

gate_error_map – Map from OpType to its associated float describing error.

add_error(self: pytket.device.QubitErrorContainer, new_error: Tuple[pytket.circuit.OpType, float]) → None¶

Adds a new error to container.

Parameters

new_error – A pair of an OpType and its associated error rate.

add_readout(self: pytket.device.QubitErrorContainer, readout_error: float) → None¶

Adds a readout error for this node.

Parameters

readout_error – Error rate of readout, in range [0,1]

property readout¶

Returns a readout error in range [0,1] for this node if it has been set.

property supported_gate_errors¶

Returns error rate by associated OpType for supported OpType.

property supported_gates¶

Retrieve OpTypes supported by Node associated with this QubitErrorContainer.
